name: Domestic R&D paid for and performed by the company as a percentage of domestic net sales, by industry and company size: 2022
description: Domestic R&D paid for and performed by the company as a percentage of domestic net sales, by industry and company size: 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_domestic_r_d_us_millions_
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_percentage_of_domestic_sales_of_r_d_performers_or_fundersa
variableMeasured.description: Percentage Of Domestic Sales Of R D Performers Or Fundersa
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_percentage_of_domestic_sales_of_r_d_performersb
variableMeasured.description: Percentage Of Domestic Sales Of R D Performersb
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of U.S. dollars and percent

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Unless indicated otherwise, statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded $50,000 or more of R&D and are not comparable with estimates published for years prior to 2018.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2022.
